channel.title: [PI] Help. Few different questions
channel.description:
Okay, well I am about 4 hours into coding. In total I mean, I just started programming tonight:P
1) My lesser demons are dee dee dee looking:\ they look like they got hit by a freight train..
2) Commands aren't working.. e.g. ::item even though they are in the command.java
3) The walking looks absolutely ridiculous. Is there any way to make it better?
4) I just made it so there is a thing under the quest tab that teles you to varrock e.g. (actionButtonId) being changed. but there is one error. "^" under the a in action (on the compiler) and it says it cannot find the symbol?
I have more questions. But that seems like a pretty big task for me already, considering I know nothing about programming ^.^

item.title: [PI] Help. Few different questions
item.dc:creator: @Cres Cres
item.description:
@Cres wrote:

hmmmm , i think your walking method’s using the wrong animation for walking XD
lemme post my method , that should work for you…

go to CombatAssistant.java
search for the getPlayerAnim method.
you should see somthing like this :

public void getPlayerAnimIndex(String weaponName){ c.playerStandIndex = 0x328; c.playerTurnIndex = 0x337; c.playerWalkIndex = 0x333; c.playerTurn180Index = 0x334; c.playerTurn90CWIndex = 0x335; c.playerTurn90CCWIndex = 0x336; c.playerRunIndex = 0x338;]
post yours , it might be so that the normal walkIndex isn’t defined there.

Read full topic

item.title: [PI] Help. Few different questions
item.dc:creator: @Sammy_May Sammy_May
item.description:
@Sammy_May wrote:

1; There could be many factors against this.

2; They could be appending only to certain player rights or player name.

3; Most likely the ‘clipping fixes’

4; What I told you earlier.

1 Can you list suggestions to fix them then? is it just the models? orrrr…

2 I could not find any, as this is the original PI so i searched for sanity and changed them all

3 I am a BRAND new coder, I am gonna need a little more specification to this pleasee!

4 Oh okay I’ll try right now and see what happens.

1) i suppose you are using the original PI? i dont know how to fix that , we generally use the 474 demon models with PI ( try Exion's PI source )

  1. did you give yourself a higher rank in yor players save file?

  2. pics plz , cant help without seeing the problem

  3. you erase the text “actionbuttonID” and just write case 0000:
    0000 being the actionbuttonID ( the number )

  • I am not sure how to go about this yet… I am guessing I need to find the correct 474 model and take out the old model and add the new? Yes I am using Sanity’s original PI

  • Yes I am playerRights 3, that’s owner correct? Or just admin?

  • Ok I can really show you with pics. It would have to be a video or something. And I dunno anything about videos. It just has really laggy uncoordinated walking. you move and the character doesnt not take steps correctly.

  • Oh I guess that would make sense ^.^ I tried to use an IDE but apparently I still need experience to understand those too…

    • Insert Quote 3. You can change how a player walks, depending on the weapon wielded.

    No sir, I mean without wielding anything. The walking is bugged or something I’m not sure yet.

    Read full topic

item.title: [PI] Help. Few different questions
item.dc:creator: @rash Rash
item.description:
@rash wrote:

  1. You can change how a player walks, depending on the weapon wielded.

Read full topic

  1. My lesser demons are dee dee dee looking:\ they look like they got hit by a freight train…

  4. I just made it so there is a thing under the quest tab that teles you to varrock e.g. (actionButtonId) being changed. but there is one error. “^” under the a in action (on the compiler) and it says it cannot find the symbol?

I have more questions. But that seems like a pretty big task for me already, considering I know nothing about programming ^.^[/quote]

  1. i suppose you are using the original PI?
    i dont know how to fix that , we generally use the 474 demon models with PI ( try Exion’s PI source )

  2. did you give yourself a higher rank in yor players save file?

  3. pics plz , cant help without seeing the problem

  4. you erase the text “actionbuttonID” and just write case 0000:
    0000 being the actionbuttonID ( the number )
